divs: Sighting DetailsI was standing outside at approximately 11:25 pm and in an instant a blue flash, completely blue covered the entire western sky here in phoenix! If you were to blink, you would have missed it. I was in my apartment complex, and couldn't see anything but the deep blue flash. I am hoping someone else witnessed this phenomena as well to find out what it is. After this encounter my body froze up and had goosebumps everywhere.
trends: There have been 417 other sightings in Phoenix
There were no other sightings in Phoenix on or around June 28th 2013
Summary: A complete blue solid flash covered the entire western sky.
